hero_description: Since 1960 active in the textile industry
about_desciption: Solid pricing, reliable delivery and a diverse collection brought the company Löscher not only to the market leader in Austria, but even the international award "international Trophy for Technologie".
history_1991_description: With the entry of Junior-Chef Günter Löscher in 1991, the export to the neighboring countries also began to increase. Löscher Gardinen are now exported worldwide and the program has been expanded through innovation, challenge and creativity.
history_1997_description: In 1997, the Augsburger Gardinenfabrik Herzog was taken over. This strengthened us in the German market and our production in Jaquard was increased by several times.
history_1998_description: Acquisition of the company Faber in Vienna, own printing production.
history_2008_description: In 2008, we brought the company Vetter Gardinen Gmbh into our fold, whose main area is in the Weissware and printing as well. In 2008, the company Ardison from Germany was also taken over.
history_current_description: thus we were able to further strengthen our products in the deco and uni sector.
